email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Vessel for Steel Coils from Busan to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Dear Lisa,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to charter a vessel for a shipment of 15,000MT steel coils from Busan to Los Angeles on CIF terms. The required laycan is 20-25 October. Could you provide a vessel offer and indicative freight rate?

Best regards,
James Lee
Ocean Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Steel Coils from Busan to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Thank you for your inquiry. I can offer the vessel PACIFIC STAR, DWT 75,000, LOA 225m, with a laycan of 20-25 October. The indicative freight rate is USD 65/MT. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Lisa Martinez
Global Freight

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Steel Coils from Busan to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Hi Lisa,

Thanks for the prompt response. USD 65/MT seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Can you offer a better rate? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and loading window?

Best regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Steel Coils from Busan to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

I can reduce the rate to USD 60/MT. The demurrage rate is USD 20,000 per day, pro rata, with a loading window of 48 hours. Let me know if this is acceptable.

Best,
Lisa

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Steel Coils from Busan to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Hi Lisa,

USD 60/MT is acceptable. Please confirm the laycan of 20-25 October and send over the charter party for review.

Best regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for PACIFIC STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Great, I will proceed with the booking. Attached is the charter party for your review. Let me know if you need any adjustments.

Best,
Lisa

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for PACIFIC STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Lisa,

The charter party looks good. We will proceed as discussed. Thanks for your help!

Best regards,
James
